headline: Take-Two, Mondelez Get Analyst Attention
summary: RESEARCH REPORTS These reports, excerpted and edited by Barron’s, were issued recently by investment and research firms. The reports are a sampling of analysts’ thinking; they should not be considered the views or recommendations of Barron’s.

headline: Mondelez Expands CFO Role To COO As Cost And Growth Pressures Mount
summary: Mondelez International (NasdaqGS:MDLZ) has expanded CFO Luca Zaramella’s role to include Chief Operating Officer responsibilities. The leadership change takes effect while the company conducts a search for a new CFO. The move concentrates financial and operational oversight during a period of cost pressures, supply chain modernization and market volatility. Mondelez International, trading at $60.31, is in a mixed performance position, with the share price up 3.1% over the past week and...

headline: Hershey positions for “lower volume sensitivity” from inflation pricing
summary: Like Mondelez earlier this week, president and CEO Kirk Tanner said pricing was not fully recovered last year from cocoa inflation.

raw.headline: Hershey positions for “lower volume sensitivity” from inflation pricing
